scenario_name: Return to Disappearance at the Twilight Estate
full_name: Prologue: Return to Disappearance at the Twilight Estate

steps.title: Setup
steps.subtext: When gathering the At Deathâ€™s Doorstep encounter set, only gather the seven [[Spectral]] locations from that encounter set. Do not gather any of the other cards from that encounter set.

steps.text: Put the eight [[Spectral]] locations into play (including the new Wine Cellar).

For the duration of the scenario, the following additional rule applies:
"When resolving the Watcher's Grasp treachery, The Spectral Watcher does not exhaust after it attacks."
Attach the Return to Disappearance at the Twilight Estate card to the scenario reference card as a reminder.
